headline: Quanex Building Products Appoints Mary Lawler to Board of Directors
summary: HOUSTON, Oct. 28, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Quanex Building Products Corporation (NYSE: NX) (“Quanex” or the “Company”) today announced the appointment of Mary K. Lawler to its Board of Directors effective November 1, 2025. George Wilson, President and Chief Executive Officer, commented, “We are thrilled to welcome Katie to our Board. Her deep human resources leadership experience in global manufacturing, combined with her strategic vision, will be invaluable as we continue to execute on our prof
